text:
Hi Team,

I am frequent user of Tomcat but this issue has come to me first time.

I am using Eclipse to write jsp and java classes for any application.
I created one application and used eclipse to make changes, but when I tried netbeans to make changes, the project got undeploy.

It was my very crucial project.
I tried to recover from recovery software but no use.
Kindly provide me suggestions on the same.

Thanks
creator: jayesh.purohit@ugamsolutions.com
markt@apache.org
text: Bugzilla is not a support forum. Please use the Tomcat users mailing list.
